dev-5.x.name: drupal/location

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-5.x.description: The location module allows you to associate a geographic location with content and users. Users can do proximity searches by postal code.  This is useful for organizing communities that have a geographic presence.
